metadata.title: CVE-2017-10687 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: In LibSass 3.4.5, there is a heap-based buffer over-read in the function json_mkstream() in sass_context.cpp. A crafted input will lead to a remote denial of service attack.

notes.note: ratliff> reproducers doesn't crash on zesty (no ASAN)

criterions.comment: libsass package in hirsute is affected and needs fixing.
